editionStmt.edition: Digital Edition in Wylie with TEI Markup

licence.p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) licence applies to this document.

projectDesc.p: This document was created and is made available in the framework of the ERC project â€œThe Dawn of Tibetan Buddhist Scholasticism (11th-13th c.) (TibSchol). This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement No. 101001002). See https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/101001002

prefixDef.p: In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "db" prefix point to the project's APIS instance, a database system to collect information of entities.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "per" prefix point to the BDRC's data interface's person module.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "zot" prefix point to a record in the projects's Zotero group.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "corpusmd" prefix point to any element in the corpus TEI document via its ID.

body.ab: jo bo mdzad cing de nyid kyi bla ma gser gling bas khyed dbu ma'i bden pa gnyis kyi 'jog lugs cig yi ger bris la skur dang gsung nas mdzad pa yin pas khungs btsun par ni des grub |
khyod la 'di bcol lo byas nas bla ma gzhan zhig la gtod pa dge bshes ston pa 'da' ba'i dus na gsung ba bzhin du yin pa las |

pu to bas de na 'dug pa kun la | glang bu bdag pos 'ded 'phro lam du bzhag nas don gnyer du seng na | glang bu de nyid du bslad na bdag po log nas 'ded pa yang srid khyim tshes lasogs pas ngo shes nas 'ded pa yang srid rang gi khyim du phyin te yong | lam las 'khyogs na
rkun mas khyer nas bsha' ba yin |

spyang nga dang rnal 'byor pa chen po thi ba'i
skad la bre mo byung ba'i gtam rgyud kyang gsung |
gsang phu ba bzhin du dngos por mngon par zhen pa je srab je srab 'gro zhing |

gtad bzod na la mar toms kyis langs na rtab 'chos pa dang | snad pa byung ba yang yod la nad lasogs pa lus sems la gnod pa mang du 'byung ba'i nyin yod pas dgon pa ba dang pu to ba kun mdzad pa bzhin du |

dge' bshes gzhon 'byung ra sgreng du byon pa'i dus na de la tshe 'di nyid la phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub 'thob pa'i man ngag yod zer mi kun yang yod du re nas 'dug pa la | pu to bas tshe 'di nyid la phyag rgya chen po'i
dngos grub 'thob pa'i skal ba can 1 rang bag gi kha dog 'di 'dra bar mi skye | skye pa rang yang yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po bzo' bo bye brag bcwo brgyad dang rigs pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas pa lasogs pa yod pa'i sar skye ba yin byas gsung ba ste |
